title: Komadori Wa, Yoru No Tobari
alternative_title: こまどりは、夜の帷 ; Robin in the Veil of Night
status: こまどりは、夜の帷 ; Robin in the Veil of Night
description:
Description :
        Police officer Norito, accompanied by his brother Shinji, a folklorist, travel to a small village deep in the mountains in order to investigate a series of suspicious deaths. The village chief, Yoshiomi, a striking man also serving as a Shinto priest, offers them a place to stay. However, within this estate, lies a secret...
